instruction: 请使用excel根据商品规格快速计算发货量，根据B列的商品规格和C列的客户订购量，在D列计算应发盒数
method: Use the LEFT, FIND, VALUE, INT, MOD, and IF functions to calculate shipping boxes from product specifications and order quantities. The formula =INT(C2/VALUE(LEFT(B2,FIND("支",B2)-1)))&"盒"&IF(MOD(C2,VALUE(LEFT(B2,FIND("支",B2)-1)))=0,"","加"&MOD(C2,VALUE(LEFT(B2,FIND("支",B2)-1)))&"支") in cell D2 extracts the number of pieces per box from column B (e.g., "12支/盒" -> 12), divides the order quantity in column C by this number to get the number of boxes (integer part), calculates the remainder, and formats the result as "X盒" or "X盒加Y支" depending on whether there's a remainder. LEFT(B2,FIND("支",B2)-1) extracts the number before "支" from the specification. VALUE(...) converts it to a number. INT(C2/...) calculates the integer part of division (number of boxes). MOD(C2,...) calculates the remainder. IF(MOD(...)=0,"","加"&MOD(...)&"支") adds "加Y支" only if there's a remainder. Copy this formula down for all rows with data.
